_header: This world him plaineth of mickle untrue
_description: On the degeneracy of the times — two couplets

CamPem258.Transcription:
þis world hym pleyneȝ of mikel ontreweWyt is ded ant
                    þat is reweȝfalsnesse regneȝ ant is aboueNon is biried
                    trew loue
